item_studdedknuckles_desc: Leather knuckle wraps studded with bone fragments.
item_bronzecestus_desc: Leather knuckle wraps with bronze studs and reinforcement.
item_ironcestus_desc: Iron battle gloves with a sharp bite.
item_silvercestus_desc: Silver battle gloves with the emblem of a wolf.
item_woodknuckles_desc: A small piece of wood to hold while you hit things.
item_blackmetalcestus_desc: Blackmetal, Iron chain, Poison infused hand weapons. These will poke someones eye out!
